titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building in Fredericksburg, Virginia, as the "Samuel E. Perry Postal Building", and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6910)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/7/1993--Introduced. Designates the Federal building located at 600 Princess Anne Street, Fredericksburg, Virginia, as the Samuel E. Perry Postal Building.
